patthana22.26:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.26:4.2: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.26:4.3: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuñca naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.26:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.26:5.2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.26:5.3: (Nahetu nanahetu ovattā, tīṇi mūlāni, ekavīsati pañhā kātabbā.)
patthana22.26:5.4: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
